title: innu yAtekE samshaya
sahitya:
innu yAtyekE samshaya mahAshA ninnana nambidavanu nannayyA


anupallavi

  unnata mahima shrI nIlakaNThEshA kangaLa pApava pariharisuva devA


caraNam    gangayena jatadalli dharisida IshA gandharva gAna meccida mahEshaarA
linga avatAra koNDida sarvEshA banhda vimOcana koDuva bharaNIshA
